TopicTitle: Project Arctic Film- Be Part Of Something Great

Articles.Content:
That is really good! To do some of those vfx, you'll probably need mods and post-processing.

*points at self*

I could do that hologram bit in Blender.

Edit: oh, are we going to need custom mods for this? I could make the tower.

Well in reality the tower can be a welded structure made of plate and whatever. We'll need custom textures definitely. Yeah post effects and stuff will defo be needed, thanks starwhip

Well in reality the tower can be a welded structure made of plate and whatever. We'll need custom textures definitely. Yeah post effects and stuff will defo be needed, thanks starwhip

Cool. Considering there is an importer for craft into Blender, if we made a .craft of the tower, I could make a 100% accurate hologram.

Perhaps soon I can make the tower. I-Beams and plates will probably be the main components.
Nice job. Just keep going!

Announcement Forum <-- Please join this to stay in the team, you have three weeks to join or reply to this thread or the google forum from today (17/05/15) if you do not, you will be seen as inactive and possibly moved to the inactive section
My computer may have just spammed you with join messages, sorry about that...
I'm up for it, provided there's an actual schedule/game plan to follow.

I finished a rather interesting 1-man VTOL yesterday... now that I have the concept, I'll make a bigger one. Perhaps that Heliplane.

Are we going to make this "realistic", with propellers (we'd probably need mods) or "Kerbal" with jet thrusters? I vote jets.

I finished a rather interesting 1-man VTOL yesterday... now that I have the concept, I'll make a bigger one. Perhaps that Heliplane.

Are we going to make this "realistic", with propellers (we'd probably need mods) or "Kerbal" with jet thrusters? I vote jets.

I also vote jets.

Also, announcements/news like this should be posted to the google group, so that everyone is getting the information faster, more reliably, and in a more organised fassion.

I also vote jets.

Also, announcements/news like this should be posted to the google group, so that everyone is getting the information faster, more reliably, and in a more organised fassion.

Mobile device no likey Google Group...

Also school internet blocks it.

Mobile device no likey Google Group...

Also school internet blocks it.

Just sent your emails to [email protected].....I may not like it because you are not in the groups but its worth a try.

Also, it you want, try getting the chrome extension "ultrasurf" from the chrome webstore. It it works It should unblock everything.
Yeah Jets seems best, hmm tuck do you want me to make a website just for announcements?

Yeah Jets seems best, hmm tuck do you want me to make a website just for announcements?

No, My idea with the google group is that whenever someone had a question/anouncement/comment/etc. they would post there, and a email with the information would shoot out to everyone involved in the project, notifying them. Also, we can keep accurate count of who is involved via who is in the group. The problem with a website is that people will have to manualy check it, and this may lead to more inactive users.
Well that email isnt working :/

Well that email isnt working :/

It must be the way that you set it up. My local robotics team uses it, and it works wonderfully. It you let me set one up, I can get it to work.

Just sent your emails to [email protected].....I may not like it because you are not in the groups but its worth a try.

Also, it you want, try getting the chrome extension "ultrasurf" from the chrome webstore. It it works It should unblock everything.

Chrome store is not supported for my device. On my laptop, however, I've got Ultrasurf as a plugin and standalone, as well as a backup proxy that has ceased functioning.

I'll check in when this team thing is sorted out.
Vagani, Can you transfer the ownership of the google group to me so that I can adjust some of the inner-most settings? (I am a very technical guy)
You are now a owner

Chrome store is not supported for my device. On my laptop, however, I've got Ultrasurf as a plugin and standalone, as well as a backup proxy that has ceased functioning.

I'll check in when this team thing is sorted out.

Now that I am owner, I can add you via an email.

Now that I am owner, I can add you via an email.

Alright, try [email protected], though if I am not mistaken, I should already be there.

Ah nvm, you are there. Did you get an email about editors and musicians?

Hey guys, whats up?

I would love to help with this in any way possible. What are you still in need of?

I think that craft submission thread is dead...

So, I'll put this here.

It's got really soft front wheel suspension, toggleable side and rear doors (Made out of antennas), and room for 6 passengers plus a driver. Theoretically it has room for eight passengers if I scooted the seats closer together.

Hey guys, whats up?

I would love to help with this in any way possible. What are you still in need of?

Just join our google group, declare your job (see 'classes' at beginning of thread) and/or intrests, and go from there.

Just join our google group, declare your job (see 'classes' at beginning of thread) and/or intrests, and go from there.

Well I have lots of interests. I will work wherever there is work. If an area is lacking, put me there!

Well I have lots of interests. I will work wherever there is work. If an area is lacking, put me there!
